name: Chaos Behemoth
text_description: The Chaos Behemoth is a massive creature drawing power from the very essence of chaos itself. When it's in play, it absorbs the first 10 points of damage directed at any Chaos type cards.
illustration_description: The card shows a massive, three-headed beast, with shadows swirling around it. Its eyes glow red with chaotic energy. The ground beneath it is cracked and broken, showing the destructive power of Chaos.
